episodes.synopsis: En route to game day on January 1, coaches and players step up their preparations while getting acclimated to intensified media attention.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: The teams spend time with their families over the holidays just days before the big game, and the Blackhawks mourn the loss of one of their own.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: The players get more rest and relaxation with friends and family, the better to emerge reinvigorated for their showdown on January 1.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: The Blackhawks and Capitals test the outdoor rink the night before the game, and the next day they leave it all on the ice before a sold-out crowd.
episodes.title: Episode 4

video.title: Road to the NHL Winter Classic
video.synopsis: Follow the Washington Capitals and Chicago Blackhawks as they prepare for and then face off in the NHL's annual outdoor Winter Classic game.
